description: 20 prompts covering CreateWidget, AddToViewport, RemoveFromParent, UI visibility toggling, HUD updates, widget+branch combos.

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint that on BeginPlay creates a widget of class WBP_HUD and adds it to the viewport.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_ShowHUD
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: CreateWidget [WidgetClass=WBP_HUD]
NODE n3: AddToViewport
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.Target [Widget]

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint with a widget variable HUDWidget. On pressing Escape, remove it from the viewport.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_RemoveHUD
PARENT: Actor
VAR HUDWidget: Widget = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Escape"]
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=HUDWidget]
NODE n3: RemoveFromParent
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Target [Widget]

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint with a widget variable MenuWidget and bool MenuOpen. On pressing Menu, toggle: if open remove widget and set false, if closed create widget and set true.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_ToggleMenu
PARENT: Actor
VAR MenuWidget: Widget = None
VAR MenuOpen: Bool = false
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Menu"]
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=MenuOpen]
NODE n3: Branch
NODE n4: VariableGet [VarName=MenuWidget]
NODE n5: RemoveFromParent
NODE n6: VariableSet [VarName=MenuOpen]
NODE n7: CreateWidget [WidgetClass=WBP_Menu]
NODE n8: AddToViewport
NODE n9: VariableSet [VarName=MenuWidget]
NODE n10: VariableSet [VarName=MenuOpen]
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n3.True -> n5.Execute
DATA n4.Value -> n5.Target [Widget]
EXEC n5.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA false -> n6.Value [Bool]
EXEC n3.False -> n7.Execute
EXEC n7.Then -> n8.Execute
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.Target [Widget]
EXEC n8.Then -> n9.Execute
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n9.Value [Widget]
EXEC n9.Then -> n10.Execute
DATA true -> n10.Value [Bool]

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint that on Tick checks distance to player. If less than 300, create and show WBP_Interact widget using DoOnce.
prompts.expected_dsl:

GRAPH: EventGraph

NODE n2: GetPlayerPawn

EXEC n6.Completed -> n7.Execute
EXEC n7.Then -> n8.Execute
